text: So I went over to the angel and 10:9 asked him to give me the little scroll. ¦ said to him, “Give me the little scroll.” Αν BYZ PCK TRasked him to give me the little scroll. And he said to me, “Take the scroll and eat it. It will make yoʋr stomach bitter, but in yoʋr mouth it will be as sweet as honey.”
